thread.title: Days Recap: Raines catches up with Hope and pulls his gun
thread.title_full: Days Recap: Raines catches up with Hope and pulls his gun

title: Days Recap: Raines catches up with Hope and pulls his gun
text:
Days Recap: Raines catches up with Hope and pulls his gun 
Christine Fix Tuesday, February 7th, 2017 
Tuesday February 7, 2017: Eric's house is searched, Raines goes after Hope via Hattie, and the "spies" in Prague learn Stefano has arrived at the ball. Pin 
Nicole arrives at the Kiriakis mansion and ignores a call from Deimos, flashing to telling him that he's a murderer. Brady appears and she cries on his shoulder about Chloe nursing her baby. She tells him all about Deimos striking out against Andre and Dario. Brady's shocked and had no idea. 
In Prague, Sonny, Paul, Steve, Kayla, Marlena and Rafe arrive at the masquerade ball in masks. Everyone has an earpiece and hears Resnick telling them Shane's on hand in London and she asks them to cover the perimeter. Marlena orders Rafe to dance with her and Kayla worries Stefano won't show. Sonny asks some guy if Rudolpho Meradi has checked in yet but the man rudely tells him this isn't a beer garden. Steve romances Kayla, telling her life is short and he won't let her go again. They kiss while Sonny tells Paul that he's a spy, just like his dad, and Sonny finds it exciting. Paul says it's not always this glam. He recalls hiding out at the docks with fish heads. Sonny gets them some martinis and flirts wildly with Paul, who is glad Sonny's there with him. Resnik tells the group that a car pulled up. They think Stefano is in the building. Paul and Sonny think they've been made and Rafe leaves Mar's side as she sees who she thinks is Stefano and goes after him. Rafe tells the clan that Stefano gave him the slip just as Marlena runs into him. 
More: Alison Sweeney's latest Hallmark movie and Michael Muhney opens up about being fired from Y&R 
In the hospital, Lt. Raines asks Hattie if she has seen Hope Brady. Hattie acts as though she's foggy since the accident. She asks "the doctor" to get out of her room as she's trying to have a private discussion with the police, so Hope takes off and Hattie breathes a sigh of relief. She stalls Raines by flirting, but he's on to her before long and realizes Hope was the doctor who just left. 
In the square, Deimos takes a call and asks a goon to keep Chad and Gabi on ice until that key is turned over. 
Deimos returns home and eavesdrops as Nicole and Brady discuss Deimos and how being with him isn't going to help her custody case. Brady will do all he can to help her bring her daughter home. Deimos' eyes shoot daggers as he watches Brady take Nicole's hand. He approaches and Brady questions if they're in a war with the DiMera and Hernandez clans. Deimos says it's handled so Brady takes off. Deimos takes pains to explain to Hope that he couldn't allow the DiMera or Hernandez men to come after them. He had to act. He's fighting to be with her and Holly. Nicole doesn't want a fight. She gives him one more chance but if there's anymore violence, she'll leave him. She leaves. Victor walks in and pours drinks for both himself and Deimos. He has heard about Deimos putting Andre and Dario in the hospital. "If you're going to eliminate your enemies, you should get the job done," he advises. They talk about how Nicole likes to pick and choose when she can grow a conscience and how vindictive Chloe's being. Deimos plans on getting Nic's baby for her. After, she'll realize he's the only man for her. 
A cop arrives at Eric's with a warrant to search for Hope. Eric's pissed. While the officer searches, Eric sees the photo Hope's been looking at of herself and her kids. He cringes and hides it while directing the cop elsewhere. The cop goes when he finds nothing. 
Hope goes running through some alley. She hides after she gets a pain in her side where she was injured. Lt. Raines finds her and pulls a gun on her. She tries talking her way out of it, telling him there's reason to believe Stefano DiMera is alive. Raines hasn't heard any of that. Hope pleads for Raines to let her go and when he doesn't, she takes off. He shoots at her... 
More: Kassie DePaiva reveals she's cancer free 
Brady finds Nicole in the square. She has packages for Holly with clothes which makes Brady worry about what she's up to. Nicole worries that she isn't bonding with her child and asks how long she has to stand by and watch someone else be her mother. He pulls her into a hug and she starts to cry. He urges her to hang on to him for support.
